#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int solve(int a, int b) {
    int c=0, ans=0;
    while(a && b) {
        int da=a%10;
        a/=10;
        int db=b%10;
        b/=10;
        c=(c+da+db)/10;
        if(c) {
            ans++;
        }
    }
    while(a) {
        int da=a%10;
        a/=10;
        c=(c+da)/10;
        if(c) {
            ans++;
        }
    }
    while(b) {
        int db=b%10;
        b/=10;
        c=(c+db)/10;
        if(c) {
            ans++;
        }
    }
    return ans;
}

int main() {
    int a, b;
    while(true) {
        scanf("%d %d", &a, &b);
        if(a==0 && b==0) {
            break;
        }
        int ans=solve(a, b);
        if(ans==0) {
            puts("No carry operation.");
        } else if(ans==1){
            printf("%d carry operation.\n", ans);
        } else {
            printf("%d carry operations.\n", ans);
        }
    }
}
